original_text: Likewise, my brothers, you also have died to the law through the body of Christ, so that you may belong to another, to him who has been raised from the dead, in order that we may bear fruit for God.
korean_text: 그러므로 내 형제들아 너희도 그리스도의 몸으로 말미암아 율법에 대하여 죽임을 당하였으니 이는 다른 이 곧 죽은 자 가운데서 살아나신 이에게 가서 우리가 하나님을 위하여 열매를 맺게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: you also have died to the law
so that you may belong to another,
to him who has been raised from the dead,
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 죽은 자들 가운데서 살아나신 이에게

sentences.original_text: in order that we may bear fruit for God.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 우리가 하나님을 위하여 열매를 맺게 하려 함이라
